ValidationRule.description: Requires a completed Content Studio project to have the "Topic" field populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Id = "01230000000wS4x" && OR( ISBLANK(Completion_Date__c), Completion_Date__c >= DATEVALUE( "2018-01-01" ) ) && ISPICKVAL( Project_Stage__c , "Completed") && ISNULL(Topic__c ) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Digital Marketing") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Standard Leads") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Filtered Leads") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Account Based Marketing") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Two-Step Nurture") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Multi-Touch Nurture") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter a Topic for this completed project.
